name: Feather Necklace with Turquoise Detail
description:
This handmade adjustable feather and turquoise necklace measures 27" to 37" in length. The feathers are a natural rich red-brown that are flexible with lots of movement. The turquoise beads measure 1" to .5" in length. There are three hidden clasps to secure the necklace to any scoop neck shirt.
If you have any questions or would like to see additional photos of this necklace please email me and I am more than happy to send more pics and answer any questions.

name: Feather Shorts
description:
The handmade feather shorts are a natural rich red-brown color. The shorts sit at your natural waist and are approximately 16 inches in length with five tiers of feathers and fit snug to your body. 
The shorts are custom made so please take note that it can take up to 2 weeks to fill your order. Express orders are available with an additional charge, please email me and I am more than happy to ensure it gets to you for a special occasion!
Get your animal on.....

(Green turquoise necklace is also available for purchase)

If you would like to see additional photos of the feather shorts please email me and I am happy to send more pics as well as answer any questions!

SIZES

X-Small: 23-24 inch waist

Small: 25-26 inch waist

Medium: 27-28 inch waist

Large: 30-32 inch waist

(However I can make any size shorts just send me your waist and hip measurements!)

name: Blue and Green Turquoise Necklace
description:
This handmade blue and green turquoise necklace is made from uniquely shaped bright blue and green beads. The necklace measures 19" in length and falls just below the collar bone. It is perfect to wear to special events or just with a t-shirt and jeans.
If you have any additional questions or would like to see more photos of the necklace please email me.

name: Fur Hat or Mask (MASKAP)
description:
This handmade warm and cozy faux fur hat transforms into a bearlike animal mask using snaps and custom-made eyeholes. This hat/mask, or MASKAP, is lined with soft wool for extra warmth on cold winter days. An interior fur flap covers and camouflages the eyeholes while the MASKAP is in hat mode. A one of a kind winter accessory! 
If you have any questions or would like to see photos of the hat/mask in the hat position please email me and I will send you additional pics!

name: Feather Skirt
description:
This handmade feather mini skirt is a natural rich red-brown color that is very flexible with lots of movement. The skirt sits at your natural waist and is approximately 16 inches in length with four tiers of feathers. 
This skirt is custom made so please take note that it can take up to 2 weeks to fill your order. Express orders are available with an additional charge, please email me and I am more than happy to ensure it gets to you for a special occasion!
If you want to see more photos of the skirt or have any questions please email me and I can send additional pics and answer specific questions!

SIZES
X-Small: 23-24 inch waist
Small: 25-26 inch waist
Medium: 27-28 inch waist
Large: 30-32 inch waist

(However I can make any size skirt just send me your waist and hip measurements!)

The Turquoise Necklace shown in photo is also for sale!  This turquoise necklace is made from beautiful blue and green turquoise beads measuring 1.5" to .5" inches in length and connected by a tan silk chord. The longest length of the outside strand is about 36 inches. The inside strand measures about 28 inches.  The price $200.00.
If you are interested email me and I will send additional photos of the necklace and answer any questions.
